mapper.insert: insert into TRADE_CALENDAR (ROW_ID, MARKET_ID, TRADE_YEAR, TRADE_MONTH, TRADE_WEEK, TRADE_DATE, DELETED_FLAG, ORIGIN_CODE, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPD_DATE, MODIFICATION_NUM) values (#{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeWeek,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update TRADE_CALENDAR
MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_YEAR = #{tradeYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_MONTH = #{tradeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_WEEK = #{tradeWeek,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_DATE = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORIGIN_CODE = #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFICATION_NUM = #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ROW_ID = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TRADE_CALENDAR set MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_YEAR = #{tradeYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_MONTH = #{tradeMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_WEEK = #{tradeWeek,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_DATE = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORIGIN_CODE = #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFICATION_NUM = #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ROW_ID = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TRADE_CALENDAR (ROW_ID, MARKET_ID, TRADE_YEAR, TRADE_MONTH, TRADE_WEEK, TRADE_DATE, DELETED_FLAG, ORIGIN_CODE, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPD_DATE, MODIFICATION_NUM) select SEQ_ROW_ID.NEXTVAL, #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(to_date(period_code,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy'), to_char(to_date(period_code,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'mm'), '', to_date(period_code,'yyyy-mm-dd'), '0', 'I', sysdate, sysdate, 0 from GP_CLASS_KLINE_D where CLASSIFY_CODE=#{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETED_FLAG='0' and not exists(select row_id from TRADE_CALENDAR where TO_CHAR(TRADE_CALENDAR.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')=GP_CLASS_KLINE_D.PERIOD_CODE)
